data.title: Policies and Procedures
data.desc: Find out what your company policies and procedures are.
data.viewDesc: Need a look at the rules your company lives by? Check out your company's additional Policies and Procedures not found in other places.

data.title: Manager Resources
data.desc: For Managers, find procedures, guidelines and special forms for your company.
data.viewDesc: Please review or select from these additional resources as needed or required.

data.title: Additional Forms
data.desc: Forms you may need. These forms can also be viewed on Myself -> Forms -> Employee
data.viewDesc: Please use the forms here as needed from time to time.
